title: Riot ripped me off
body:
https://i.imgur.com/yxKg9bU.png

I clicked the claim vengeance button in client and nothing happened to my brother standing next to me.

I demand that riot give me what was promised.

replies.body:
Well first you need to introduce him to League.

Then get him to play ranked.

Then Riot will help you claim vengeance.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Calad,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=V3vEeTmy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-30T19:15:12.644+0000)
>
> It's a long con.

LOST REFERENCE?!?!?!?
First you tell him maining Juggernauts will make him strong then go mobile ranged opressing ADC into every matchup against him and watch his despair.

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=V3vEeTmy,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-11-30T22:21:46.123+0000)
>
> First you tell him maining Juggernauts will make him strong then go mobile ranged opressing ADC into every matchup against him and watch his despair.

https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSo33nC3bvuVBM4NDya4m7pAvA-uooI0OhdZobJ3osYAJNmXMBD
Tell him that mordekaiser in particular is OP against the likes of teemo and Quinn
And if he accuses you of lying, tell him that he just isn't playing him right.

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=V3vEeTmy,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-12-01T17:38:16.856+0000)
>
> Tell him that mordekaiser in particular is OP against the likes of teemo and Quinn

That sums up the last 4  of my ranked match ups.   Auto loss at Champion select.  Riot Games " we don't belong in hard counters". Except for Immobile melees. They have hard counters

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=V3vEeTmy,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-12-01T17:38:16.856+0000)
>
> Tell him that mordekaiser in particular is OP against the likes of teemo and Quinn

Morde stomps teemo, just rush a spirit visage and enjoy the free kills, unless he builds AD teemo, then you might be fucked.
Yes, if you expose your brother to league the toxicity will eventually give him cancer
dont worry varus q should be hitting any minute now

How's your internet connection? Do you use Ethernet cables? Do you have duct tape and shovel? Also, cutting the pieces up quickens decomposition because of the increased surface area.
{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
i think he means he wants something to happen to his brother. His upset his brother is still standing next to him.
I know that, i was making a joke, you just didnt get it.
Varus can't claim vengeance worth shit. That's Kalista's job.

I still claimed vengence and waiting for a Taliyah Emote on the boards.

{{champion:163}}
